document.full_text: toronto slugger jose bautista continued his red-hot form by hitting three home runs in the blue jays' 11-3 rout over the minnesota twins sunday.
document.title: toronto's bautista stays on fire with three homers for jays
lines_and_colors: toronto slugger jose bautista continued his red-hot form by hitting three home runs in the blue jays' 11-3 rout over the minnesota twins sunday.
